Type WithFakes<TFakeEngine>

Namespace Machine.Fakes

Base class for the simpler cases than WithSubject<TSubject, TFakeEngine>. This class only contains the shortcuts for creating fakes via "An" and "Some".

Based on v0.2.3.0 of Machine.Fakes (650da0)
